mapper.insert: insert into members( member_id, name, email, phone_number, age, gender, password, authority ) values( #{member_id}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone_number}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{password}, #{authority} )
mapper.update: update members set name = #{member.name}, email = #{member.email}, phone_number = #{member.phone_number}, age = #{member.age}, gender = #{member.gender}, password = #{member.password}, authority = #{member.authority} where member_id = #{member.member_id}
